OFFICIAL BALLOT FOR ELECTION OF REGIONAL DIRECTORS
Piece an X in the space preceding the name of the person for whom you wish
to vote. YOU MAY VOTE ONLY FOR THE DIRECTOR OF YOUR REGION.
